page.title: 05Lunchtime At School
page.content:
Every day 150 children and 5 staff have a lunch cooked in the school canteen. The rest go home to lunch.
Favourite School Lunches
Roast ********** ********** Fish and Chips ********** ********* Salad **** Shepherd's Pie ******
There are two sittings, we sit eight to a table. We collect our own food from the dinner ladies who serve it, there is usually a choice of main course and of sweet. We like to complain about the food and some of us would like to bring a packed lunch to school,but nobody does because the school lunch is very good really, for 65p a day.
